item.title: Web-based Game Editor Notes
item.description: Game Editor / Wiki-like but with vaidation and repuation controls Use-Case * View, Create, Edit or Delete a Resource, Recipe, Quest You can out aribtrary script into Hugo, so could grab the latest game data and render it: <script type="text/javascript" src="link/to/chart.js"></script> Would be great for the player to be able to edit and download the latest version of CSV file for themselvs Need a way to share / find collections of edits from other players Maybe need some sort of reputation to get it into consideration> I want to pick a branch of the game [main] and clone and modify the game design bits as CSV files, then uploadmy changes as candidates Have a queue view of changes by users

item.title: Feb 24 2018 Thursday's Delights
item.description: Saturday Feb 24, 2018 Almost 130 distinct days we have spent developing Million on Mars. (Need to file Trade Mark/URL?) The game is playable in stage 2, and stage 3 is coming online now that Kyle has colonists getting hungry and eating food Max did a great job yesterday creating 12 mini-state icons and having them render in the game I have to remind that Max is very efficient and talented, but he likes being given specific jobs from me, he is self-directed on his own projects.
